item.title: Community Alert: Bitcoin Hashpower Platform Bitroo Has Been Offline for Over a Year and a Half, and Users Are Still Unable to Withdraw Funds
item.description: On September 2nd, the Bitcoin hashrate leasing and resale platform Bitroo has been experiencing abnormal withdrawal operations since April 2024. Users still cannot withdraw funds normally, resulting in a large amount of user funds being frozen. Crypto influencer EncryptedWarrior stated that he had recharged 50,000 USDT and has not received an official response yet. It is understood that the founder of Bitroo is former Golden Finance CEO An Xinxin.According to community sources, Bitroo issued an official email statement in March 2025, stating that due to an accident at an upstream cooperative mine, hashrate leasing and mining machine hosting services have been temporarily suspended. The platform stated that it will conduct an account settlement according to the agreement and fully refund user investments.

item.title: James Wynn's 25x leveraged ETH long position has been partially liquidated, with a liquidation price of $4,258.75
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by OnchainLens, James Wynn's 25x leveraged long position in ETH was partially liquidated once again. Presently, he still maintains a long position in ETH with a nominal value of $300,000. The opening price is $4,317.85 and the liquidation price is $4,258.75.

item.title: CleanCore Solutions is planning to raise $175 million to implement the DOGE Treasury Strategic Plan, with pre-market trading seeing a temporary drop of over 70%.
item.description: On September 2nd, the U.S. listed company CleanCore Solutions, Inc. (ZONE) announced that it had entered into a Securities Purchase Agreement to issue and sell 175,000,420 pre-funded warrants in a private investment in public equity (PIPE) offering. The total expected proceeds were approximately $175 million, net of placement agent fees and other offering expenses (funded with a combination of cash and cryptocurrency), in order to implement the DOGE Treasury strategy.According to market data, after the announcement of the implementation of the DOGE Treasury strategy, CleanCore Solutions, Inc. (ZONE) saw a plunge of over 70% in pre-market trading.

item.title: Venus: Protocol Will Remain Paused and Assist Affected Users in Fund Recovery Efforts
item.description: On September 2nd, the Venus Protocol issued a security incident update indicating that they have had direct contact with the victim of a phishing attack. The protocol will be paused, and Venus will make every endeavor to recover their funds. Venus was not affected and is dedicated to safeguarding user security.

item.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $109,000, Ethereum Falls Below $4,300
item.description: On September 2nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $109,000, experiencing a 24-hour decline of 0.22%; Ethereum dropped below $4,300, with a 24-hour decrease of 2.16%.

item.title: A Whale Wallet Linked to Fraudulent Initial Coin Offering (ICO) Projects Has Dumped Approximately 50.22 Million Tokens, Profiting Around $8.78 Million
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by The Data Nerd, 4 hours ago, a whale address beginning with 0xFAc deposited the final 5.4 million WLFI into Binance (approximately $1.35 million). By selling 20% of the unlocked tokens (approximately 50.22 million tokens), this address has achieved a profit of approximately $8.78 million, with an investment return rate of 226%. The address still holds 80% of the locked tokens, which is approximately 202 million tokens.

item.title: Greeks.Live: Ethereum Shows Significant Relative Weakness to Bitcoin, Market Exhibits Divergence Pattern
item.description: September 2nd, Greeks.Live issued its daily market brief. It indicates that the overall market is disappointed with the performance of Ethereum. It is believed that Ethereum has weakened significantly compared to Bitcoin. Traders have shifted to a generally bullish stance on allocating to Bitcoin, resulting in a market situation where Bitcoin rises alone while mainstream coins experience a widespread decline. The market has witnessed whale buy orders of 260,000 ETH, and there is intense long and short speculation around the $4,400 price level.

item.title: A whale transferred 6294 ETH to a CEX 20 minutes ago, worth $27.56 million
item.description: On September 2nd, according to EmberCN's monitoring, a whale transferred 6,294 ETH to Bybit 20 minutes ago, which is worth $27.56 million.The address accumulated these ETH a month ago. At that time, the average buy-in price was $3,779, and the value was $23.71 million. It is estimated that the profit from this sale is $3.76 million.

item.title: Yunfeng Financial has announced the purchase of 10,000 ETH to establish an Ethereum asset reserve.
item.description: On September 2nd, the Hong Kong-listed company CF Benchmarks (00376.HK) announced that the company's board of directors has given the green light to the purchase of ETH on the open market as a reserve asset. As of the announcement date, the group has purchased a total of 10,000 ETH on the open market, with a total investment cost (including fees and expenses) of $44 million. The funds used for this purchase are from the group's internal cash reserves, and the purchased ETH is classified as investment assets in the group's financial statements.

item.title: PublicAI has announced a partnership with Chainlink, causing PUBLIC to surge over 39% in half an hour.
item.description: On September 2nd, the decentralized AI data platform PublicAI announced a partnership with the Oracle Network Chainlink in order to enhance its data validation and distribution capabilities.Meanwhile, PublicAI announced a token buyback of 2 million, which led to the token PUBLIC surging by 39% within half an hour and is now trading at $0.073.
